scripts.build-web: lerna run gen-version --scope='web' && lerna run build --scope='web'
scripts.build-dev: npm run clear-build && npm run build-micro && npm run copy-all-dist
scripts.build: npm run build-dev && npm run build-web
scripts.copy-apps: mkdir ./demo/web/public/app && lerna exec --scope='{app,foundation}' -- mkdir ../web/public/app/\$LERNA_PACKAGE_NAME && lerna exec --scope='{app,foundation}' -- cp -r ./dist/* ../web/public/app/\$LERNA_PACKAGE_NAME
scripts.copy-all-dist: npm run copy-container && npm run copy-apps
